thread.title: 1 killed, 4 injured after small plane crashes into house in California (PHOTOS, VIDEOS)
thread.title_full: 1 killed, 4 injured after small plane crashes into house in California (PHOTOS, VIDEOS)

author: RT
title: 1 killed, 4 injured after small plane crashes into house in California (PHOTOS, VIDEOS)
text:
1 killed, 4 injured after small plane crashes into house in California (PHOTOS, VIDEOS)  40 Edited time: 28 Feb, 2017 02:45 At least 1 person has been killed and 4 injured after a small plane, believed to be Cessna 310 with two people on board, crashed in a neighborhood east of the Riverside Municipal Airport, setting several houses on fire. 
DETAILS TO FOLLOW #BreakingNews A Cessna 310 plane crashes into homes in Riverside. The plane was heading to San Jose from Riverside. @KTLA pic.twitter.com/NEdrVxyVAA — Matt Phillips (@MattPhillipsTV) February 28, 2017 Update: street video of aftermath from plane crash into homes in Riverside. @CBSLA pic.twitter.com/iEM1hk65v0 — Jeff Vaughn (@JeffVaughn) February 28, 2017 Riverside Plane Crash victims being treated as Riverside Fire Fighters battle flames @CBSLA pic.twitter.com/lMJeErpOy6 — stu mundel (@Stu_Mundel) February 28, 2017 Saw the crash and I can't stop shaking pic.twitter.com/oors0csLDa
